name: ICHOS
description:
Orange circles appear in the direction that projectiles are coming from, use WASD and the Arrow Keys to move your character out of danger.

An intense and atmospheric score based game in which you must dodge projectiles using your heightened sense of hearing.

===============================================================

  These circles depict sound, using them you can detect incoming projectiles.  

   These are projectiles, if when hits you, you will explode!  

And this is you, good luck!  

===============================================================

Move with WASD or ARROW KEYS.

Made for TriJam167.
